data.title: Get the distance
data.solution:
<?php
$ligne = $A = $B = [];

fscanf(STDIN, "%d %d", $W, $H);
for ($i = 0; $i < $H; $i++)
{
    $LINE = stream_get_line(STDIN, $W + 1, "\n");
    $ligne[] = str_split($LINE);
}

foreach($ligne as $y => $l)
{
    foreach($l as $x => $c)
    {
        if($c == 'A'){ $A = ['x' =>$x, 'y' => $y]; }
        if($c == 'B'){ $B = ['x' =>$x, 'y' => $y]; }
    }
}

$dx = abs($A['x']-$B['x']);
$dy = abs($A['y']-$B['y']);
$distance = round(sqrt(pow($dx,2)+pow($dy,2)));

echo($distance."\n");
?>
data.statement:
The object of this game is to get the euclidean distance between the two points: A and B on a plane.

The plane is a rectangle of width [[W]] and height [[H]]. It containes exclusively : "-" (representing a empty case), "A" and "B".
data.constraints:
3 ≤ [[W]] ≤ 100
3 ≤ [[H]] ≤ 100
The distance between the two points must be rounded to the unit
data.stubGenerator:
read W:int H:int
loop H read LINE:string(W)
write ANSWER
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> Two integer [[W]] and [[H]] representing the Width and Height of the plane.
<<[[H]] next lines :>> [[W]] chars containing either a "-" (empty case), a "A" (the first point) or a "B" (the second point).
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> An integer for the rounded euclidean distance between A and B

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

The object of this game is to get the euclidean distance between the two points: A and B on a plane.

The plane is a rectangle of width W and height H. It containes exclusively : "-" (representing a empty case), "A" and "B".
Input
Line 1 : Two integer W and H representing the Width and Height of the plane.
H next lines : W chars containing either a "-" (empty case), a "A" (the first point) or a "B" (the second point).
Output
Line 1 : An integer for the rounded euclidean distance between A and B
Constraints
3 ≤ W ≤ 100
3 ≤ H ≤ 100
The distance between the two points must be rounded to the unit
Example
Input
7 5
-------
--A----
-------
----B--
-------
Output
3
